title: Bonus Epilogue Tears of Tess
description: From New York Times Bestseller, Pepper Winters, comes a FREE BONUS EPILOGUE for the Dark Romance Trilogy, Monsters in the Dark.  This bonus takes place as an additional snippet to TEARS OF TESS told from Tess's Point of View.  Also included is a three chapter preview to PENNIES (Dollar Series #1) and CAN'T TOUCH THIS (romantic comedy standalone).  Happy Reading!
author: Pepper Winters
